mapper.select: select review_content, review_regdate, product_name from m_review r, m_product p, m_member m where p.product_number = r.product_number and r.member_number = m.member_number and m.member_number= #{member_number} and ROWNUM <= 3 ORDER BY review_number DESC

select member_nickname, review_content, review_regdate, product_name from m_member m, m_review r, m_product p where m.member_number = r.member_number and r.product_number = p.product_number order by review_number DESC
select COUNT(*) from m_member m, m_review r, m_product p where m.member_number = r.member_number and r.product_number = p.product_number order by review_number DESC

select member_nickname, review_content, review_regdate, product_name from(SELECT ROWNUM num, member_nickname, review_content, review_regdate, product_name from(select member_nickname, review_content, review_regdate, product_name from m_member m, m_review r, m_product p where m.member_number = r.member_number and r.product_number = p.product_number order by review_number DESC)) WHERE num BETWEEN (#{section}-1)*100+(#{pageNum}-1)*10+1 AND (#{section}-1)*100+(#{pageNum})*10
